p: For the AECOPD subjects, those with pathogens identified in the NPA had similar hospital LOS (11.7 ± 9.6 vs 12.9 ± 10.5 days, p = 0.29), 30 day readmissions (0.23 ± 0.50 vs 0.28 ± 0.52times, p = 0.35), 60 day readmissions (0.39 ± 0.66 vs 0.53 ± 0.88times, p = 0.06), in-hospital mortality (2.8 vs 3.1%, p = 0.59), 30 day mortality (5.7 vs 5.8%, p = 0.58) and 60 day mortality (8.5 vs 8.1%, p = 0.51) compared with those without isolation of pathogens.
